scripts.prebuild: mkdirp dist/css && mkdirp dist/js && mkdirp dist/img
scripts.build: npm run compile-css && npm run render-html && npm run cp-images && npm run cp-js
scripts.compile-css: npm run sass && npm run postcss
scripts.cp-js: copyfiles -f src/js/site.js dist/js && copyfiles -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/js
